trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SEQ_00<tab>Komuxio is pining for a wayward friend.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SEQ_01<tab>Komuxio fears for the safety of his friend Claxio, who has wandered off unaccompanied. He bids you find Claxio and bring him back to Little Solace.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SEQ_02<tab>Though you are able to find Claxio, the sylph has no intention of returning with you. Take word of this to Komuxio, who awaits at Little Solace.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SEQ_03<tab>According to Komuxio, tempered sylphs are prowling the area, and Claxio is in grave danger. You must track him down before he falls thrall to primal influence.

TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SEQ_04<tab>You find Claxio just in time to prevent tempered sylphs from spiriting him away. Following an emotional reunion with Komuxio, Claxio agrees to return to Little Solace. Return to the village yourself and see what Komuxio has to say.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SEQ_05<tab>Your efforts on his friend's behalf have earned you Komuxio's unreserved trust. Will the sylph elder be as accepting?
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Claxio.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Komuxio.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_TODO_02<tab>Find Claxio.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_TODO_03<tab>Report to Komuxio.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_000<tab>Helpful one arrives at a good time! This one needs helpful one's help!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_001<tab>One of these ones named Claxio ventured outside Little Solace alone. Alone is unsafe! Helpful one must find Claxio!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_002<tab>Claxio struck west after leaving the settlement. Hurry before Claxio ends up in the belly of a beastly one!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_010<tab>What? Walking one wants this one to return to Little Solace? Don't make this one laugh!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_011<tab>This one is weary of living with those who are not these ones. This one wants to be alone.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_012<tab>These ones rely on walking ones for everything. No better than those ones that summoned a primal one! Small wonder this one chose to leave!

TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_013<tab>This one thought this a likely place to build a home. But then meddling one arrives─forces this one to go deeper into the forest. Meddling one is forbidden from following this one! Away with meddling one!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_020<tab>What? Claxio refused to return to these ones, and went deeper into the forest!?
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_021<tab>B-But this one saw touched ones lurking in the forest! Helpful one must hurry─hurry and find Claxio!

TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_022<tab>Helpful one should search for spools of thread on the forest floor. Those things will lead helpful one to Claxio. But hurry! Hurry, before touched ones take Claxio away!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_025<tab>Meddling one is back!? This one told meddling one to be gone! Tell Komuxio that this one will never go back! <var 1A 02 /var>Never<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_026<tab>T-Touched ones? Touched ones should go away too! This one is good one! Every one should just leave this one alone!!!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_PAPALYMO_000_027<tab>Be on guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. These sylphs have been tempered―brought under the thrall of the primal Ramuh.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_PAPALYMO_000_028<tab>Akin to the Amalj'aa tempered by Ifrit, these sylphs exist only to serve their deity.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_YDA_000_029<tab>They'll not answer to words―only steel. I take no pleasure in this, but it must be done.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_032<tab>Th-This one is...safe? This one was so scared...
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_033<tab>Claxio! This one has been worried! So very worried! Is Claxio unharmed? Still in possession of wits?
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_034<tab>K-Komuxio? And meddling one as well... Why are these two here?
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_035<tab>These two came to rescue Claxio! That Claxio is safe fills this one with joy!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_036<tab>Komuxio...forgive this one. This one did not mean to run away from Little Solace. This one was just...afraid.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_037<tab>These ones who live at Little Solace were changing─becoming friendly with other ones.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_038<tab>This one feared that these ones were forgetting who these ones are...like touched ones did. But this one was wrong. This one can see that now.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_000_039<tab>Meddling─er, <var 1A 02 /var>helpful<var 1A 01 /var> one. This one is grateful. This one will return to Little Solace to be with Komuxio and friendly ones.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_PAPALYMO_000_039<tab>Well, that should see to that. What say we return to Little Solace as well? I, for one, could do with a nice, hot bath.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_040<tab>This one thought Claxio was lost forever. Helpful one saved Claxio―now these ones can be family again.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_041<tab>This one has known many walking ones―even many kind walking ones―but helpful one is kindest and strongest of all. Helpful one is a hero to these ones.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_042<tab>Helpful one will bring these ones and walking ones closer together―this one knows. This one would take helpful one to see elder one.
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_KOMUXIO_000_043<tab>But elder one is... Elder one is...
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat the tempered sylphs!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SYLPHBOSS_GAIUSA201_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Claxio... These ones are your friends... Come with these ones... Serve primal one together...
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_BATTLETALK_02<tab>No! This one is good one! Will never go with bad ones!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_SYLPHBOSS_GAIUSA201_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Meddling one not smart to anger this one... This one has many friends in the forest...
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_PAPALYMO_BATTLETALK_04<tab>A morbol!? And things were going so well...
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_CLAXIO_BATTLETALK_05<tab>N-No...not stinky one! Stinky one is scary! Stinky one's stink makes this one's head go spinning!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_YDA_BATTLETALK_06<tab>Ick! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>―Papalymo and I can handle this beast. You take care of the sylphs!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_PAPALYMO_BATTLETALK_07<tab>There's something not right about this morbol. Ignore it and focus your attacks on the sylphs!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_YDA_BATTLETALK_10<tab>Hurry up, Papalymo―I can't bear this stench any longer!
TEXT_GAIUSA201_00724_PAPALYMO_BATTLETALK_11<tab>I'm doing the best I can! If we dispatch the sylphs, surely...
